long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically be notified when Zentail.com has a cheaper price for the product you are looking at on your favorite retail websites.


Who is Zentail.com?

Zentail.com is a fast growing online retailer who ships directly from manufacturers and distributors to offer better pricing to consumers. While most companies pay a lot of money for warehouses, people and freight, Zentail.com removes all the costs in the middle. While we don’t yet have the economies of scale of larger retailers, we do have the lowest price on tens of thousands of products.  


Why use this plugin?

This plugin will automatically tell you when you can save money by shopping on Zentail.com. While we don’t have the largest catalog yet, we add tens of thousands of products a week. We also add products that our users specifically want. We don’t always have the cheapest price, but as we grow, we pass on our reduced prices to you. With this plugin, you will join us for the ride and don’t have to check in on our progress, it will automatically show you anytime we can save you money on a product you are about to buy.
